U can. Just know that hsbc will reject if you sign your giro form digitally if you are setting up giro payment for another name.Need to print without signature then sign with ink for them to accept. If u are setting up giro to pay your own cc bill then digital signature is ok.
For HSBC Visa Platinum  isit all purchases under these categories qualifies for 5% rebate?Is this on top of the 1x rewards points?

15K Fast in is to fulfil HSBC premier requirements  can just fast in. For everyday rewards for premier is 5k in and 5 transfer out. So normally I just pump in $15k monthly on first of each month and withdraw out in 5 transaction to settle the requirements
